Rovisco Pais 1049-001, Lisboa, Portugal carlos.caleiro@tecnico.ulisboa.ptc.caleiro at skype Associate Professor for Logic and Computation at ISTFounding member and Scientific Council Vice-Chair of SQIG ORC ID 0000-0001-5587-6585 Microsoft Academic Author 1687820 Short Biography Born in 1970 in Lisbon, Carlos Caleiro graduated in Applied Mathematics and Computation at IST in 1993 and received his PhD in Mathematics from Universidade Técnica de Lisboa in 2000. Since 2010 he is Associate Professor at the Department of Mathematics of IST, now at Universidade de Lisboa.Teaching Elements of Programming Theory of Computation ResearchHis research focuses on applications of logic to computer science, including information security, temporal logic, algebraization of logics, combination of logics, and abstract deductive systems.Projects GeTFun: Generalizing Truth-Functionality (EU FP7 - Marie Curie, 2013-2016) KLog: Kleistic Logic (FCT - PTDC, 2007-2010) Publications Journal papers All (including submitted papers) Supervision PhD Students current: Pedro Filipe (since 2017) past: Guilherme Ramos (2018); Andreia Mordido (2017); Bruno Conchinha (2014); Maxime Gamboni (2010); Ricardo Gonçalves (2008); João Marcos (2005) Post-Docs current: past: Sérgio Marcelino (2012-2018); Marco Volpe (2011) location | contact | +info Webpage under Creative Commons License. 2009 SQIG-IT.
